Texts.Eng: A Skath Plasma Minigun, decommissioned for display.
Texts.Chs: 一把绘世者等离子迷你炮，退役后用于展示。

Texts.Eng: A mighty dangerous lookin' Skath Minigun.
Texts.Chs: 一把看起来很危险的绘世者小型手枪。

Texts.Eng: Miniguns like these are used by heavily-armed infantry to cover our frontliners. Its plasma can put a dent in even our power armour.
Texts.Chs: 全副武装的步兵用这种小型火炮掩护我们的前线。它的等离子甚至可以削弱我们的动力装甲。

Texts.Eng: This thing looks really heavy. If I try to lift it, I might break my back.
Texts.Chs: 这东西看起来很重。如果我试着举起它，我可能会摔断我的背。
